summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2195 for the improvement of Shelby Street, from West Park Drive to East Park Drive, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, by constructing watermains and sewers therein, together with all necessary appurtenances for the proper drainage, sewerage, water service and fire protection of said district, except certain streets thereof, which shall be improved by constructing watermains therein, together with all necessary appurtenances for the proper water service and fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 21816, and levying and assessing the amount thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
